code: /* selectors */export var getModal=function getModal(_ref){var modal=_ref.modal;return modal;};/* action name creator */var reducerName='modal';var createActionName=function createActionName(name){return"app/".concat(reducerName,"/").concat(name);};/* action types */var ADD_MODAL=createActionName('ADD_MODAL');var REMOVE_MODAL=createActionName('REMOVE_MODAL');/* action creators */export var addModal=function addModal(payload){return{payload:payload,type:ADD_MODAL};};export var removeModal=function removeModal(payload){return{payload:payload,type:REMOVE_MODAL};};/* reducer */export var reducer=function reducer(){var statePart=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case ADD_MODAL:{return true;}case REMOVE_MODAL:{return false;}default:return statePart;}};
